company.name: Magestore
company.tagline: Helping Magento retailers connect online and offline business by providing scalable and customizable POS system
company.description:
Do you want your Magento store more powerful? Let us lead the way!

Magestore is an expert in Magento eCommerce solutions with more than 10,000 global customers and around 200 partners globally. 

Our strategic products include Omnichannel Retail Solutions for Magento Retailers. 
The solutions are not just our POS integration and Inventory Management alone, but the whole retail management system to help the retailers drive sales and enhance customer experience through all channels.
Our POS is built with PWA technology and integrates natively into your Magento platform.

We offer free 1-year support and lifetime update service. With our customization service, your requests will be tailored perfectly no matter where you are from and what you do.
